thread.section_title: Vermont Farm Table Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vermont Farm Table | vermontfarmtable.com
thread.title: Anita Price Roth
thread.title_full: Vermont Farm Table reviewed by Anita Price Roth

author: Anita Price Roth
title: Anita Price Roth
text:
My walnut live-edge Vermont Farm Table was just delivered. From shopping to ordering to delivery, everyone at Vermont Farm Table is gracious, professional and a pleasure to work with.
The table is stunningly beautiful. Great care, pride and skilled craftsmanship is evident -- from the selection of the wood to how it was masterfully honed into a table. It was built with heart. It will be used with heart and great appreciation for generations to come.
